text: Thermo may refer to: * Adobe Thermo, a designers' tool for creating the user interface for Rich Internet Application by Adobe Systems * Heat, energy transferred from one system to another by thermal interaction * Thermo Fisher Scientific, a healthcare equipment company * Thermo, Greece, a town in Aetolia-Acarnania, Greece * Thermodynamics, the branch of physical science concerned with heat and its relation to other forms of energy and work * Thermos, an insulating storage vessel which keeps its contents hotter or cooler than its surroundings ==See also== *
title: Thermo
